alert.note: Alert for Claiborne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:19PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Claiborne and southwestern Lee Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 418 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harrogate, or near Middlesboro, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tazewell, Harrogate, Cumberland Gap and Powell River Preserve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
